sentences.sContent: EVEN if I granted all that I have been refuting, the friends of despotism would be no better off.
sentences.sContent_eng: EVEN if I granted all that I have been refuting, the friends of despotism would be no better off.
sentences.sCn: 即使我接受我所反驳的所有观点，专制主义拥护者的日子也好不到哪里去。

sentences.sContent: There was nothing to fear from the Egyptians, accustomed as they were to despotism since the Pharaonic age.
sentences.sContent_eng: There was nothing to fear from the Egyptians, accustomed as they were to despotism since the Pharaonic age.
sentences.sCn: 关于埃及人，没有什么好恐惧的，因为他们自法老时期就已经习惯于专制了。

sentences.sContent: He can recognise a despot, and the occasions when despotism has to be checked, by force if necessary.
sentences.sContent_eng: He can recognise a despot, and the occasions when despotism has to be checked, by force if necessary.
sentences.sCn: 他能够一眼识破专制的表象，以及这种专制应该何时有必要使用武力加以控制。
